title: Amplify Energy Stock Tumbles After California Oil Spill
sub_head: Houston-based company has shut down its pipeline operations in the area as a precautionary measure
body:
Shares of Amplify Energy Corp. lost more than half their value in premarket trading Monday after a major oil spill at the companyâ€™s platform off the coast of Orange County, Calif., over the weekend.
California officials on Sunday were trying to limit damage from the spill of an estimated 126,000 gallons that extended from Newport Beach to Huntington Beach, a distance of about 6 miles.
